q1.prompt: Who, of the following names, is the originator of the C++ language (not C, but C++).

q2.prompt: All valid C code is also valid C++ code.

q3.prompt: Which of the following are valid signatures for the entry point of a C++ program (select all that apply).  By valid, one that results in no compiler errors or warnings.

q4.prompt: Which of the following are valid C++ data types (select all that apply).
